text: @realDonaldTrump You ass.  The virus is already here.  WTH!  This is a stupid political distraction tactic to deflect from your incompetence in handling our Country’s COVID-19 crisis.  To distract from going on 1 million Americans getting COVID and almost 50,000 Americans dead. Ass!
